name: English To Marathi Dictionary
description: English to Marathi Dictionary  It is not possible to either carry or open a Dictionary Book always. But the electronic Dictionary will be always with You as Phone is your closest companion now a days.   App is completely free, you dont have to pay anything ever!!   This app works offline  you do not need an internet connection.  Fast as it works offline   Alphabetical listing   A Search tool   A learning tool  Search results exact match as well as suggestion match
